channel.title: Obsidians on Kaga Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Obsidians on Kaga Blog

item.description:
一、面向对象 程序设计 简介

对象之间的关系

依赖:对类 B 进行修改会影响到类 A 。

关联:对象 A 知道对象 B。类 A 依赖于类 B。

聚合:对象A知道对象B且由B构成。类A依赖于类B。

组合:对象 A 知道对象 B、由 B 构成而且管理着 B 的生命周 期。类 A 依赖于类 B。

实现: 类 A 定义的方法由接口 B 声明。 对象 A 可被视为对象 B。类 A 依赖于类 B。

继承: 类 A 继承类 B 的接口和实现， 但是可以对其进行扩 展。对象 A 可被视为对象 B。类 A 依赖于类 B。

本质上说，重构就是在代码写好之后改进它的设计。

如果你要给程序添加一个特性，但发现代码因缺乏良好的结构而不易于进行更改，那就先重构那个程序，使其比较容易添加该特性，然后再添加该特性。

是需求的变化使重构变得必要。

重构技术就是以微小的步伐修改程序。如果你犯下错误，很容易便可发现它。

好代码的检验标准就是人们是否能轻而易举地修改它。

总结：

开展高效有序的重构，关键的心得是：小的步子可以更快前进，请保持代码永远处于可工作状态，小步修改累积起来也能大大改善系统的设计。重构不是一颗"银弹"，却可以算是一把"银钳子"，可以帮你始终良好地控制自己的代码。重构是一个工具。

一. 代码的坏味道

1. 神秘命名（Mysterious Name）

There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things-- Phil Karlt

命名是编程中最难的两件事之一。正因为如此，改名可能是最常用的重构手法，包括改变函数声明（用于给函数改名）、变量改名、字段改名。

2. 全局数据（Global Data）

封装变量。有少量的全局数据或许无妨，但数量越多，处理的难度就会指数上升。

3. 可变数据（Mutable Data）

可以用封装变量来确保所有数据更新操作都通过很少几个函数来进行，使其更容易监控和演进。

如果一个变量在不同时候被用于存储不同的东西，可以使用拆分变量将其拆分为各自不同用途的变量，从而避免危险的更新操作。

使用移动语句和提炼函数尽量把逻辑从处理更新操作的代码中搬移出来，将没有副作用的代码与执行数据更新操作的代码分开。

设计API时，可以使用将查询函数和修改函数分离。

尽早使用移除设值函数，缩小变量作用域。

4. 过长函数（Long Function）

积极地分解函数.

原则：每当感觉需要以注释来说明点什么的时候，我们就把需要说明的东西写进一个独立函数中，并以其用途（而非实现手法）命名。

什么样的函数才是过长？超过50行？超过70行？关键不在于函数的长度，而在于函数"做什么"和"如何做"之间的语义距离。

如何确定该提炼哪一段代码呢？一个很好的技巧是：寻找注释。它们通常能指出代码用途和实现手法之间的语义距离。

1. Your First Python Program

1.1. Diving In

$ python3 humansize.py

1.2. Declaring Functions

1.2.1. Optional and Named Arguments

def approximate_size(size, a_kilobyte_is_1024_bytes=True):

1.3. Writing Readable Code

1.3.1. Documentation Strings

Triple quotes

def approximate_size(size, a_kilobyte_is_1024_bytes=True):
    '''Convert a file size to human-readable form.
<!--ID: 1720005573526-->


    Keyword arguments:
    size -- file size in bytes
    a_kilobyte_is_1024_bytes -- if True (default), use multiples of 1024
                                if False, use multiples of 1000

    Returns: string

    '''
拉伸胸大肌、胸小肌 拉伸肩前束 肩关节内旋状态下做外旋、外旋状态下做内旋 辅助肱骨推举和侧平举

基础知识

数字 连读：double 0 , triple 0 7-screen cinema 4-liter engine 时间、地点、生活常识

圈关键词

前二后二 竖向比较

最稳定： 数字、名词、专有名词

不稳定： 形容词、动词

大坑词： 形容词（比如最高级…） 常见反义词（比如 close open…） 否定词（比如 no）

找不同看特点

较稳定： 听原词，好定位

不稳定： 找替换词，灵活应对

大坑词： 有陷阱，要小心

三大特征

原词(发音)

逻辑表达 and so, because one thing, another thing, the other but particularly in fact then for example

替换改写

错题七坑

词音（连读） 拼写 句子 逻辑 改写 格式 单复数

![[Pasted image 20240516194055.png]]

预读预判题目选项

画

  • 每道题独有的关键内容
  • 有具体内容的实词
  • 强逻辑内容： 否定 ![[Pasted image 20240516195257.png]] 并列 A and B = B and A ![[Pasted image 20240516195332.png]] 转折让步 ![[Pasted image 20240516195351.png]]

不画

  • 每道题都有的内容
  • 没有具体内容的虚词
  • 没有特定含义的动词：do、have、get…

拼命往下预读

抓住时间间隙

学会预判

数字、人、单复数

画关键词只是手段，关键是理解题目、预判内容

听音

大量单词听写

语音现象

  1. 连读/连音
  • 辅音+元音 ![[Pasted image 20240517115024.png]]
  • 辅音+辅音 ![[Pasted image 20240517115050.png]]
  • 元音+元音 加音连读/j/ /w/ ![[Pasted image 20240517115310.png]]
  1. 弱读 一般实词重读、虚词弱读 ![[Pasted image 20240517115710.png]]

  1. 异化（浊化） ![[Pasted image 20240517120119.png]]

Basic1

major discipline anthropology linguistics physiology psychology mining physical physics fine arts science politics philosophy geography photojournalism history astronomy media language applied environment chemistry management statistics archaeological accountancy biology computer literature sociology engineering architecture business law economics finance banking orientation welcome package register enroll curriculum semester term assignment session virtual test course study intensive practice email lecture tutorial seminar assessment attendance exam failure mark grade score record resit note rate group office parental teaching class reception goal tape video plus level beginning beginner fundamental elementary advanced mid discussion stress unemployment surroundings diet take regular exercise make plans set money aside do training courses open admission cassette recording deadline dropout cramming feedback videotape hit examination diploma workshop panic teaching president headmaster director scientist secretary administrator professor officer teacher tutor lecturer adviser historian supervisor receptionist chancellor assistant senior advisor paper abstract content bibliography project revision extensive subject survey research reading data draft ambition well-organized subtopics questionnaire interview respondent literature conclusion random index topic presentation background example training laser printing area chapter case study report method title approach theory whiteboard aid overhead objective visual finding faculty heading subtitle observation strategy outline script summary scientific reference review analysis library catalog due renewal overdue and pay a fine

tools

同义替换积累：freerice, vocabulary.com 模拟机考：同桌英语 口语练习：elsa pi 词汇积累：墨墨背单词 => anki 听写工具：DailyDictation、QwertyLearner、EarthWorm

basic

单词 听写 同义替换 考点词（阅读+听力） elsa 口语练习

听力

  1. 何琼网课
  2. 查理网课
  3. 雅思王真题语料库：重点章节 （名词章） + 电话号码章，以及姓名听写章
  4. 真题

阅读

  1. 查理网课
  2. 刘洪波网课
  3. 真题

口语

vince9120 steve collocation Simon的口语课 宋凌的口语素材包 王陆语料库

写作

九分学长 vince 杜世民

Plan

重要

单词 2h 听力题 1h 阅读题 1.5h

每天必做

单词（500） + 听力 （100）+ 口语 elsa + 听写训练 + 15min 同义替换训练 2h + 1h + 1h + 0.5h = 4.5h 整理笔记 （同义替换、改写）

#IELTS

雅思阅读

词汇 + 语法 + 解题技巧 + 阅读量

语法

从句

![[../../static/img/reading/Pasted image 20240322142710.png]]

非谓语

![[../../static/img/reading/Pasted image 20240322143452.png]]

核心：同义替换

  • 同义词
  • 同义短语
  • 同义句子（主动被动）

题型分类

1. 顺序题

题型内部的出题顺序
（一般为顺序） 判断 填空 图形填空 选词填空 回答问题 单选 句子匹配

2. 乱序题

段落匹配 Which paragraph contains 人名/学说/国家/公司等信息匹配 段落大意 Heading

3. 特殊题

选文章标题 Title/副标题 Subtitle 多选

平行做题法：三步走

预读题画关键词； 带着问题去读文章定位，文章只读一遍、各题型平行 做题； 对比答案句和题目进行解题 ![[../../static/img/reading/Pasted image 20240323194946.png]]

down in the dumps feeling down

be all ears listen carefully

it’s been ages it’s been so long

cut to the chase come straight to the point

a blessing in disguise profit from a misfortune

actions speak louder than words

don’t put all your eggs in one basket

cost an arm and a leg

a drop in the ocean

practice makes perfect

Education

sth. be an arduous process be very rewarding someone’s aspiration someone’s pursuit concentrate on sth. form the basis of sth. use lateral thinking rely on linear thinking break the mould academic performance academic qualifications standardised test be gifted be talented rote memorisation learn sth. by heart read extensively induce cramming ignorance standard of upright conduct students’ autonomy self-discipline role model set a good example meet someone’s expectations fall short of someone’s expectations cannot be guaranteed success cover a lot of ground be well-rounded comprehensive coverage of sth. self-paced education self-paced learning core curriculum the aims of education academic attainment specialise in sth. extra-curricular activities promote equality repress individuality co-education a single sex school mixed-ability class distinguish sb. from distinguish sth. from anti-social behaviour be well-behaved adolescence a healthy outlook on life a positive outlook on life well-adjusted adults drop out of school skip school come of age be bilingual be monolingual slack off apply oneself disruptive students unruly students act up meet the demand of … be geared to sth. inform sb. about sth. put theory into practice first-hand experience the responsibility for sth. falls on sb. the responsibility for sth. rests with sb. shirk one’s responsibilities for sth. fulfil one’s responsibilities deny sb. the freedom to do sth. compulsory subject kindle someone’s interest in sth. optional courses optional subjects there is no substitute for sb. there is no substitute for sth. distance learning compromise a happy medium be sb.’s mentor sb.’s peer take someone under sb.’s wing burn the midnight oil study intensively

1 Basic

It is no exaggeration to say I don’t think it’s far-fetched to say It is entirely reasonable to assert that Without a doubt, it can be said that One can objectively state that There is no denying the fact that To put it simply and accurately, Speaking of something When it comes to something Concerning something What comes into my mind first is What floats into my mind first is The first thing that springs to my head is It’s difficult to generalise It varies from person to person It’s just a matter of individual preference But if I have to speculate, I probably It is difficult to pinpoint the exact reason, according to my observation From my perspective, it appears that To some extent, it seems that Amazing Impressive Unbelievable Incredible

1. General Intro to IELTS Speaking Test

Introductory Frame

![[Pasted image 20240330185042.png]] Full Name English Name Country

The Process

Part1 4-5 min, 3 topics, 9 questions

  • Questions about yourself
  • Topics to do with daily life
  1. Is there anything you don’t like about your living area?
  2. What do you study?
  3. Which do you prefer, Saturday or Sunday?

Examiner can ONLY:

【图表类小作文补充表达】

【表达：程度】

程度

逐渐的

● slightly ● modestly ● gradually

稳定的

● steadily ● sustained

显著的

● noticeably ● remarkably ● markedly

巨大的

● significantly ● remarkably ● dramatically ● rapidly ● sharply

大量的/少量的

● a great/signifcant/major proportion (of…) ● (only) a fraction (of…)

最大量/少量

● greatest/most significant proportion (of…) ● smallest/least significant proportion (of…)

以不同的程度

● to different/varying degrees

【流程图类小作文补充表达】

【表达：持续时间】

持续时间的表达

● It takes TIME to ● This stage lasts for TIME ● After a period of TIME ● During a TIME period ● For TIME

【表达：尺寸】

不同形状

● square/squared ● rectangle/rectangular ● circle/circular ● triangle/triangular ● trapezoid/trapezoidal

长度/宽度/深度

● length (long) ● width (wide) ● depth (deep)

宽窄

● wide/broad ● narrow/tight

小作文的本质：summarise+compare main features

**静态图vs动态图

静态图没有时间变化，动态图有。

**什么是 Main features?

  • 数据：最大值，最小值，等值，差值，倍数，大于，小于
  • 趋势：上升，下降，波动，不变 (静态图不描写趋势，只做数据对比)
  • 程度：大 ，小，剧烈，平稳

第一段Introduction写什么？改写原文描述

**什么是原文描述？ 某种图 shows 某种数据在某种条件下

**如何改写？

  • 某种图：line graph, bar chart,pie chart, table, flowchart,map
  • shows可替换成：illustrates，compares
  • 数据的几种改写形式：Proportion→Percentage，Information→Data，Number→Figure，Types→Categories，Trends→Changes
  • 条件的改写形式：UK，US，Netherlands→Three Countries；1990，1991，1992→Three Years/Between 1990 and 1992/Over a two-year period.

例1：开头改写示例

**改写前：The graph below shows average yearly rainfall in London and Paris measured in millimetres. 改写后版本1：The line graph illustrates average annual rainfall measured in millimetres in two cities. （同义替换+改变语序） 改写后版本2：The line graph compares the two cities in terms of average annual rainfall measured in millimetres.

【地图类小作文补充表达】

【表达：方位】

in、to、on

细分用法

● (A) in the east of B ○ 表示：A在B的内部的东侧。 ● (A) to the east of B ○ 表示：A在B的外部的东侧。 ● (A) on the east side of B ○ 表示：A在B的东侧边上。

通用用法

● in、to、on都可以表示在整体区域的某侧。 ● 但是，to会更常用。

接part

● 主要看介词与part的关系： ○ in the northern/southern part ○ on the northern/southern part

附近

● near ● next/close/adjacent to

健康的表现：耐力/力量/灵活性/敏捷性/平衡/速度/协调

endurance strength flexibility agility balance speed coordination

生活

人们生活

an individual’s life people’s lives people’s way of life/mode of living people’s living conditions people’s lifestyles people’s living

living相关

cost of living standard of living living standard living environment

安排

arrange organize

参与

be involved in be engaged in be dedicated in participate in be devoted to

宝贵的/有价值的

helpful essential indispensable beneficial valuable/invaluable informative supportive

1 Basic

endurance strength flexibility agility balance speed coordination an individual’s life people’s lives people’s way of life people’s mode of life people’s living conditions people’s lifestyles people’s living cost of living standard of living living standard living environment arrange organize be involved in be engaged in be dedicated in participate in be devoted to helpful essential indispensable beneficial valuable invaluable informative supportive it is crucial for someone to do something it is important for someone to do something it is vital for someone to do something it is imperative that someone do something someone plays an important role in doing something the key to doing something lies in someone’s action someone should take on the responsibility to do something someone should shoulder the responsibility to do something

1. 小作文

对所看到的数据、信息进行客观、准确、全面的描述。

1.1. 小作文图表分类

Line graph Bar chart Pie chart Table

1.2. 图表类小作文中的图表特征

静态图 时间点小于等于1 difference 动态图 时间点大于2 change

数据

最大值 最小值 等值 差值 倍数 大于 小于

趋势，动态图使用

上升 下降 波动 不变

程度大小

剧烈 平缓

tool

Bclm

brew tap zackelia/formulae
brew install bclm
sudo bclm write 80
bclm read
sudo bclm persist

Bob

brew tap owo-network/brew
brew install deeplx
brew services start owo-network/brew/deeplx

# Update to the latest version
brew update
brew upgrade deeplx
brew services restart owo-network/brew/deeplx

# View the currently installed version
brew list --versions deeplx
